posts.title: BPMN
posts.text: 1Test 테스트 [업무 흐름 그리기] 프로젝트 가져오기 git clone ssh://git@52.79.173.131:722/jesoos/processes.git BPMN Authoring Tool Caumnda Modeler 설치 https://camunda.org/download/modeler/ 그리기 git 저장소에 push git status git add … git commit -m “…” git push git 저장소에서 pull git pull Tutorial • Overview ○ /Tutorial/BPMN 2.0 Study Card - Overview.pdf • 주교재 ○ http://www.bpmb.de/images/BPMN2_0_Poster_EN.pdf • 부교재 ○ http://www.omg.org/news/meetings/workshops/SOA-HC/presentations-2011/14_MT-2_Brookshier.pdf • 동영상 ○ https://www.bizagi.com/container/video_tutorial_modeler_en.html BMPN Sample /Payment_VULGI.bpmn

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
